project.description:
Generate the rosdistro cache and make it available.
Generated from catkin-debs/resources/static_jobs. Do not edit on Jenkins but in the repository.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y python-rosdistro rosdistro_generate_cache groovy --cache `pwd`
# upload plain cache scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -qr `pwd`/groovy-dependencies.yaml rosbuild@wgs32:/var/www/www.ros.org/html/rosdistro/
# upload tar of cache tar cvjf groovy-dependencies.tar.gz groovy-dependencies.yaml scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -qr groovy-dependencies.tar.gz rosbuild@wgs32:/var/www/www.ros.org/html/rosdistro/
